attributes.additional_details: This E petition is for the government to reform the BBC. At present we have BBC 1,2,3,4, news and parliament channels, in which they have no commercial breaks. The UK parliament should merge BBC 1 with BBC 2,3 and 4 and to merge BBC news with BBC parliament, making the channel be called the BBC news and parliament channel this will save money and there should be commercial breaks as well, which means to scrap the BBC license fee.
